base_link_url.description: Base link URL for the store

base_static_url.description: Base static URL for the store

base_media_url.description: Base media URL for the store

secure_base_url.description: Secure base URL for the store

secure_base_link_url.description: Secure base link URL for the store

secure_base_static_url.description: Secure base static URL for the store

secure_base_media_url.description: Secure base media URL for the store

base_currency_code.description: The base currency code for the store.

base_currency_symbol.description: The currency symbol of the base currency for the store.

default_display_currency_code.description: The default display currency code for the store.

default_display_currency_symbol.description: The currency symbol of the default display currency for the store.

available_currency_codes.description: The list of allowed currency codes for the store.

exchange_rates.description: The list of exchange rate information for the store.

currency_to.description: The currency code associated with the exchange rate.

rate.description: The exchange rate for the associated currency and the store's base currency.

id.description: The country id for the store.

two_letter_abbreviation.description: The country 2 letter abbreviation for the store.

three_letter_abbreviation.description: The country 3 letter abbreviation for the store.

full_name_locale.description: The country full name (in store locale) for the store.

full_name_english.description: The country full name (in English) for the store.

available_regions.description: The available regions for the store.

customer-data-customer-interface.description: Customer entity interface for API handling.

dob.description: In keeping with current security and privacy best practices, be sure you are aware of any potential legal and security risks associated with the storage of customers’ full date of birth (month, day, year) along with other personal identifiers (e.g., full name) before collecting or processing such data.

default_shipping.description: If this address is default shipping address.

default_billing.description: If this address is default billing address

framework-search-aggregation-interface.description: Interface Aggregation to get faceted data

framework-search-filter-group.description: Groups two or more filters together using a logical OR

filters.description: A list of filters in this group

framework-filter.description: Filter which can be used by any methods from service layer.

min_qty.description: Minimal quantity available for item status in stock

min_sale_qty.description: Minimum Qty Allowed in Shopping Cart or NULL when there is no limitation

max_sale_qty.description: Maximum Qty Allowed in Shopping Cart data wrapper

notify_stock_qty.description: Notify for Quantity Below data wrapper

link_url.description: Link url or null when type is 'file'

disabled.description: If gallery entry is hidden from product page

types.description: Gallery entry image types (thumbnail, image, small_image etc)

is_html_allowed_on_front.description: The HTML tags are allowed on the frontend

used_for_sort_by.description: It is used for sorting in product listing

is_filterable_in_search.description: It is used in search results layered navigation

is_used_in_grid.description: It is used in catalog product grid

is_visible_in_grid.description: It is visible in catalog product grid

is_filterable_in_grid.description: It is filterable in catalog product grid

apply_to.description: Apply to value for the element

is_searchable.description: The attribute can be used in Quick Search

is_visible_in_advanced_search.description: The attribute can be used in Advanced Search

is_comparable.description: The attribute can be compared on the frontend

is_used_for_promo_rules.description: The attribute can be used for promo rules

is_visible_on_front.description: The attribute is visible on the frontend

used_in_product_listing.description: The attribute can be used in product listing

options.description: Options of the attribute (key => value pairs for select)

is_user_defined.description: Current attribute has been defined by a user.

note.description: The note attribute for the element.

updated_at.description: Category last update date and time.

catalog-data-product-render-search-resul.description: Dto that holds render information about products

catalog-data-product-render-interface.description: Represents Data Object which holds enough information to render product This information is put into part as Add To Cart or Add to Compare Data or Price Data

images.description: Enough information, that needed to render image on front

type.description: Product type. Such as bundle, grouped, simple, etc...

store_id.description: Information about current store id or requested store id

currency_code.description: Current or desired currency code to product

catalog-data-product-render-button-inter.description: Button interface. This interface represents all manner of product buttons: add to cart, add to compare, etc... The buttons describes by this interface should have interaction with backend

url.description: Url, needed to add product to cart

required_options.description: Flag whether a product has options or not

catalog-data-product-render-formatted-pr.description: Formatted Price interface. Aggregate formatted html with price representations. E.g.: $9.00 Consider currency, rounding and html

minimal_price.description: The minimal price of the product or variation

regular_price.description: Price - is price of product without discounts and special price with taxes and fixed product tax

weee-data-product-render-weee-adjustment.description: List of all weee attributes, their amounts, etc.., that product has

tax_amount.description: Tax which is calculated to fixed product tax attribute

catalog-data-product-render-image-interf.description: Product Render image interface. Represents physical characteristics of image, that can be used in product listing or product view

created_at.description: Cart creation date and time. Otherwise, null.

updated_at.description: Cart last update date and time. Otherwise, null.

converted_at.description: Cart conversion date and time. Otherwise, null.

is_active.description: Active status flag value. Otherwise, null.

items_count.description: Number of different items or products in the cart. Otherwise, null.

items_qty.description: Total quantity of all cart items. Otherwise, null.

customer_is_guest.description: For guest customers, false for logged in customers

grouped-product-data-grouped-options-int.description: Represents `product item id with qty` of a grouped product.

store_to_base_rate.description: Store currency to base currency rate

store_to_quote_rate.description: Store currency to quote currency rate

base_to_global_rate.description: Base currency to global currency rate

base_to_quote_rate.description: Base currency to quote currency rate

available.description: The value of the availability flag for the current shipping method.

subtotal_with_discount.description: Subtotal in quote currency with applied discount

base_subtotal_with_discount.description: Subtotal in base currency with applied discount

shipping_discount_amount.description: Shipping discount amount in quote currency

base_shipping_discount_amount.description: Shipping discount amount in base currency

weee_tax_applied_amount.description: Item weee tax applied amount in quote currency.

shipping_tax_amount.description: Shipping tax amount in quote currency

base_shipping_tax_amount.description: Shipping tax amount in base currency

subtotal_incl_tax.description: Subtotal including tax in quote currency

base_subtotal_incl_tax.description: Subtotal including tax in base currency

shipping_incl_tax.description: Shipping including tax in quote currency

base_shipping_incl_tax.description: Shipping including tax in base currency

row_total_with_discount.description: Row total with discount in quote currency. Otherwise, null.

tax_amount.description: Tax amount in quote currency. Otherwise, null.

base_tax_amount.description: Tax amount in base currency. Otherwise, null.

discount_amount.description: Discount amount in quote currency. Otherwise, null.

base_discount_amount.description: Discount amount in base currency. Otherwise, null.

price_incl_tax.description: Price including tax in quote currency. Otherwise, null.

base_price_incl_tax.description: Price including tax in base currency. Otherwise, null.

row_total_incl_tax.description: Row total including tax in quote currency. Otherwise, null.

base_row_total_incl_tax.description: Row total including tax in base currency. Otherwise, null.

weee_tax_applied_amount.description: Item weee tax applied amount in quote currency.

weee_tax_applied.description: Item weee tax applied in quote currency.

inventory-in-store-pickup-api-data-searc.description: Search results for providing pickup locations.

inventory-in-store-pickup-api-data-picku.description: Represents sources projection on In-Store Pickup context. Realisation must follow immutable DTO concept. Partial immutability done according to restriction of current Extension Attributes implementation.

inventory-in-store-pickup-api-data-searc.description: Endpoint used to search Pickup Locations by different parameters: - by attribute filters fields @see \Magento\InventoryInStorePickupApi\Api\Data\SearchRequest\FiltersInterface - by distance to the address @see \Magento\InventoryInStorePickupApi\Api\Data\SearchRequest\AreaInterface Also, endpoint supports paging and sort orders.

Filter by Distance to the Address. Pickup Locations will be filtered by distance according to the geo-position of the entered address. Required fields for the address are country and one of the field: region or city or postcode.
Filter to filter by Fields. Each field may be filtered with different condition type. Supported condition types restricted by @see \Magento\Framework\Api\SearchCriteriaInterface
